Package kueres.media

Interface FileSystemRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFileSystemRepository
public interface FileSystemRepository
An interface for all functions needed by the media system that interact with storage. A custom implementation of this interface can be created to customize how files are stored. An example would be to provide an implementation that connects to an Amazon S3 bucket.
Since:
Feb 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Engbrocks, tim.engbrocks@student.kit.edu

  • Method Details

    • save

      java.lang.String save​(java.lang.Long id, byte[] content)
      Save a file by its MediaEntitys identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - - the files MediaEntitys identifier
      content - - the byte content of the file
      Returns:
      The path of the file.

    • findByLocation

      org.springframework.core.io.FileSystemResource findByLocation​(java.lang.String location)
      Find a file by its path.
      Parameters:
      location - - the path of the file
      Returns:
      The file specified by the path.

    • delete

      boolean delete​(java.lang.String location)
      Delete a file by its path.
      Parameters:
      location - - the path of the file
      Returns:
      If the file was deleted successfully.
